product_name: ASICS GT-1000 2 GS Road-Running Shoes - Boys'
long_description: Young athletes will appreciate the cushioning and support of the ASICS GT-1000 2 GS road-running shoes for boys. Uppers are made of lightweight, flexible polyester mesh and synthetic textile to offer breathability and comfort. Wicking polyester linings move excess moisture away from feet and dry fast. Dual-density DuoMax(R) midsoles use proprietary polymer material that's lighter than standard EVA and offers enhanced cushioning longevity. Rearfoot GEL(R) cushions in heels are designed for impact comfort. Nylon plates offer lightweight support. High-performance blown rubber outsoles have abrasion-resistant material in the heels and forefeet that cushions and increases traction and feel. ASICS GT-1000 2 GS road-running shoes proudly carry the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association.
short_description: Young athletes will appreciate the cushioning and support of the ASICS GT-1000 2 GS road-running shoes for boys.
